string.text: {=vdU42Q1x79}Have you heard a young BEASTER HUNTER, the story of a teenager shooting down a jumbo brown bear?Yes, that's me. The people in the village call me.

{=QYWvSWbzZU}I have been interested in bows shot with arrows since I was a child. Is the one of the village best hunters. Then, one time, the village was caught with Starve. The blue blood friend call me to hunt some game in forest with him.

{=BTJWv1ZHGM}Unfortunately, noting in forest, like hare or dear. Nothing. But a colossus was coming out. A huge brown bear! Try to slaught my friend. I immediate shot an arrow into it critical viscera. Friend alive, and the bear dead. After that, the folks call me BEASTER HUNTER.
{=KQg2keX1OI}In several hunts since that, we argue with the share. My man tells me I have shared some more to village after back to the village. We start a fight, end with my man dead.
{=c1eBwb03nr}That's... a bad Move. I geuss you lose every things with it.
{=4VgvWhWS7c}What a crime! You have to expiate your sin.
{=GxinGkmb14}Right. Then I had been banished from village. But I can keep my seax and bow. And I traveling around, final in this tarvern. Looking for someone hire me to hunt.
{=vdU42Q1x79}Have you heard a young BEASTER HUNTER, the story of a teenager shooting down a jumbo brown bear?Yes, that's me. The people in the village call me.

{=QYWvSWbzZU}I have been interested in bows shot with arrows since I was a child. Is the one of the village best hunters. Then, one time, the village was caught with Starve. The blue blood friend call me to hunt some game in forest with him.

{=BTJWv1ZHGM}Unfortunately, noting in forest, like hare or dear. Nothing. But a colossus was coming out. A huge brown bear! Try to slaught my friend. I immediate shot an arrow into it critical viscera. Friend alive, and the bear dead. After that, the folks call me BEASTER HUNTER.
{=KQg2keX1OI}In several hunts since that, we argue with the share. My man tells me I have shared some more to village after back to the village. We start a fight, end with my man dead.
{=c1eBwb03nr}That's... a bad Move. I geuss you lose every things with it.
{=4VgvWhWS7c}What a crime! You have to expiate your sin.
{=GxinGkmb14}Right. Then I had been banished from village. But I can keep my seax and bow. And I traveling around, final in this tarvern. Looking for someone hire me to hunt.
